projects.title: BeerLedge
projects.summary: BeerLedge is a website that allows you to checkin beers that you've drank in a post-privacy world.

projects.title: pushfile
projects.summary: pushfile is a command-line tool that allows you to push files to your own S3 bucket, seamlessly!

projects.title: How Old Is This Metro Car?
projects.summary: A simple website that shows how old your Washington DC metro car is based on the car's id number.
